description: An HTML file for a web-based mobile app called GOATFarmer, which provides goat farming advice through a chat interface with selectable questions, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code for dynamic behavior and data fetching.

methods.name: showAbout
methods.description: Displays the 'About' screen by toggling active classes.

methods.name: showChat
methods.description: Returns to the chat screen from the about page.

methods.name: addMessage
methods.description: Adds a chat message to the chat window; differentiates between user and system messages.

methods.name: buildSymptomResponse
methods.description: Constructs a response message based on symptom data, listing causes and advice.

methods.name: buildActionResponse
methods.description: Constructs a response message based on action data, detailing when, how often, how, and why.
